comment.original:
If you have lived in any city in either main stream China or places that have a lot of Tibetans by race, I don't know a lot of Tibetans but most that I've encountered. literally don't. give. a f*ck.
They're interested in the same careers, hobbies etc as anyone else there. That's like saying all African Americans agree with Jesse Jackson or all white Americans under age 30 agree with Occupy Wallstreet.
